alert.note: Alert for Hickman; Lewis; Perry; Wayne (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 31 at 10:01PM CDT until March 31 at 10:45PM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Nashville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Lewis County in Middle Tennessee... Northern Wayne County in Middle Tennessee... Perry County in Middle Tennessee... Western Hickman County in Middle Tennessee... * Until 1045 PM CDT. * At 1001 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles east of Sardis, or 16 miles northeast of Savannah, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Hohenwald, Centerville, Waynesboro, Linden, Clifton, Lobelville, Gordonsburg, Kimmins, Mousetail Landing State Park, Pleasantville, Flatwoods and Bucksnort. This includes Interstate 40 between mile markers 150 and 157. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for Middle Tennessee. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for Middle Tennessee.
